title: kaLakaNThI kathankAram
sahitya:
kaLamoLimma kEvalam I yAmini kANka virasAyayyO


anupallavi

  naLinAkSNam shrI padmanAbha cADu vacanam kaLiyennu karutAyga kAraNamAyE nUnam


caraNam 1    pashupakSi mrgangaL pOlum ramikkavE tAn pranayani kaLODukUDi 
asaraNayAi madanArthi pUNDitimEvAn shashimukhi ghana pApajAlamEva nidAnam
    caraNam 2    parama bhAgyavatiya kumArODinnu mE pati bata ramincciDumennO 
taruNi tAmasamEnye dayitanODumE khEdam aruLceydu sahasAta mAnayamadu pante
